section.title: Hear Your AI Banking Assistant in Action
section.description: Listen to real conversations showcasing how our AI handles various banking scenarios with professional, secure communication following Central Bank guidelines.

voice_demos.title: Account Opening Inquiry
voice_demos.description: AI guides new customer through business account opening process

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Emirates First Bank. I'm Aisha, your AI banking assistant. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Hello, I'd like to open a business account for my new consulting company in Dubai.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Congratulations on your new business! I'd be happy to help you open a business account. May I start by getting your trade license number and the nature of your consulting business?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Sure, it's license number 785692, and we provide IT consulting services.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Perfect! For IT consulting, our Business Plus account offers excellent benefits including free international transfers and priority customer service. I can schedule an appointment with our business specialist tomorrow at 10 AM or 2 PM to complete the process.

voice_demos.title: Loan Pre-Qualification
voice_demos.description: Customer inquiring about personal loan eligibility and rates

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Good afternoon! This is Dubai Investment Bank. I'm Omar, your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I'm interested in a personal loan for home renovation. What are your current rates?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help with your home renovation loan! Our current personal loan rates start from 4.99% APR for qualified customers. May I ask your monthly salary to check your eligibility?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: My monthly salary is 18,000 AED, and I need about 100,000 AED for the renovation.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Excellent! Based on your salary, you're pre-qualified for up to 150,000 AED at 5.2% APR. For 100,000 AED over 5 years, your monthly payment would be approximately 1,890 AED. Would you like me to start your application?

voice_demos.title: Investment Consultation
voice_demos.description: High-net-worth client seeking investment advice and portfolio guidance

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Good morning, Mr. Al-Mansouri. This is Fatima from ADCB Wealth Management. Thank you for your interest in our investment services.

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: Hello Fatima. I'm looking to diversify my portfolio with some UAE and international investments. I have about 500,000 AED to invest.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: That's a substantial investment amount. Based on current market conditions, I'd recommend a balanced portfolio: 40% UAE stocks and bonds, 35% international equity funds, and 25% in our UAE real estate investment trust. This provides diversification with strong local exposure.

transcript.speaker: Client
transcript.text: What kind of returns should I expect, and what are the fees?

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Historically, this allocation has delivered 8-12% annual returns. Our management fee is 1.2% annually, and I can schedule a detailed consultation with our senior wealth advisor to discuss your specific financial goals and risk tolerance.

voice_demos.title: Account Service Request
voice_demos.description: Existing customer requesting account information and transaction help

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Hello, thank you for calling First Abu Dhabi Bank customer service. I'm Khalid, your AI assistant. How may I assist you today?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Hi, I need to check my account balance and also set up a standing order for my rent payment.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: I'd be happy to help with both requests. For security, may I please verify your account with the last 4 digits of your Emirates ID and your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Sure, Emirates ID ends in 9247, and my birthday is March 15th, 1985.

transcript.speaker: AI Agent
transcript.text: Thank you for verification. Your current account balance is 45,680 AED. For the standing order, I can set up monthly rent payments. What amount and date would you like the transfer to occur each month?
